negotiate_compromise.title: Terms and Conditions
negotiate_compromise.description: Director Vale leans back: 'Compromise? Very well. The Cartel will halt our competitive pricing campaign if the independents agree to operate within designated market segments. They get the small, unprofitable routes - we handle major commerce. Everyone knows their place.' The offer hangs in the air like a trap.

choices.text: 'What guarantees do the traders have that you'll honor this?'
'I need to consult with the traders before agreeing.'
'This isn't a real solution. I'm looking elsewhere.'
